text: “Au ne hiihai e hagabudu mai agu daangada gadoo be tangada dela e hadi nia huwa o dana hadagee. Gei ogo digaula e ala gadoo be di laagau ‘grape’ dela ono huwa ai, mo di laagau ‘fig’ dela ono huwa ai, mo nia lau o nia maa guu mae gi lala, gaa hidi iei Au gaa wanga tenua la gi digau hua gee gi hai henua ginai.”
